arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Fiorentina – Croatia Starlet Frontrunner To Replace Injured Armenian Veteran
arts.sum: Petar Sucic is reportedly the frontrunner to replace Henrikh Mkhitaryan in Wednesday’s Serie A clash between Inter Milan and Fiorentina.
